title: Chiropractor In St Paul | Minnesota | Balance Natural Health Center
description: Balance Natural Health Center is the office of Sara Cooper, DC, a gentle and effective chiropractor in St. Paul, Minnesota.
cleaned_text: top of page Feel better naturally. Call Now: 651-789-0547 low res 0008_edited low res 0008_edited 1/1 Experience optimized health today by getting your body in balance. Your body is built to recover, heal and function optimally. Our goal at Balance Natural Health Center is to assist that process through gentle and effective chiropractic care. We start by listening to your story so that we can work with you to optimize your body's function. In addition to traditional chiropractic methods, we can analyze your blood chemistry and make nutritional and lifestyle recommendations to improve your body's physiology, as well as employ energy work and neurologic techniques to help you feel better and restore balance to your life. Naturally. bottom of page
